projects.title: Clustering Data and Visualizing in 2D
projects.description: This project introduces students to unsupervised learning through hands-on clustering. Participants start with simple 2D datasets and advance to high-dimensional clustering using K-means and Self-Organizing Maps. The project also offers an optional contribution to a new visualization method for understanding cluster structures.
projects.useCase: Understanding patterns in unlabeled datasets, customer segmentation, document grouping, and exploratory data analysis.
projects.expectedOutputs: Cluster visualizations, comparative analysis between K-means and SOM, and optional contributions to new visualization techniques.

projects.description: This project analyzes Bitcoin and Ethereum price movements over time to determine trends, volatility, correlations, and high-activity periods. Students explore market behavior using real historical price datasets.
projects.useCase: Financial analytics, volatility measurement, portfolio insights, and trend analysis for crypto markets.
projects.expectedOutputs: BTC vs ETH comparative line charts, monthly summary tables, volatility insights, and correlation results.

projects.title: Predicting Stock Prices with Machine Learning
projects.description: This project applies machine learning to predict stock prices using historical financial data. Students explore data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model building for time-series forecasting.
projects.useCase: Financial forecasting, investment decision support, and time-series modelling.
skillsGained: ML model training (e.g., Linear Regression, Random Forest, SVR)
projects.expectedOutputs: Forecasted price curves, comparison of ML models, and analysis of prediction accuracy.
